fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.connectors

Class AdmissionControllerNotificationConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.connectors.AdmissionControllerNotificationConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI, AdmissionControllerNotificationI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class AdmissionControllerNotificationConnector
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements AdmissionControllerNotificationI
    The class AdmissionControllerNotificationConnector implements a connector for ports exchanging through the interface AdmissionControllerNotificationConnector.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant, Salammbo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdmissionControllerNotificationConnector() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addcoresNotification(boolean findressouce)
      the addcoresNotification method receives a notification from the RequestDispatcher to indicate the result of adding cores . if state is false , the PerformanceController try to add ApplicationVM if state is true, it releases the lock and applies a regulation time before the next control
      void addVMNotification(java.lang.Boolean state)
      the addVMNotification method receives a notification from the AdmissionControlleur to indicate the result of adding an applicationVM if state is true, it releases the lock and applies a regulation time before the next control
      void frequencyDecreaseNotification(java.lang.Boolean state)
      the frequencyDecreaseNotification method receives a notification from the RequestDispatcher to indicate the result of decreasing frequency . if state is false , the PerformanceController try to remove cores .
      void frequencyIncreaseNotification(java.lang.Boolean state)
      the frequencyIncreaseNotification method receives a notification from the RequestDispatcher to indicate the result of increasing frequency . if state is false , the PerformanceController try to add cores if state is true, it releases the lock and applies a regulation time before the next control
      void removecoresNotification(boolean findressouce)
      the removecoresNotification method receives a notification from the RequestDispatcher to indicate the result of removing cores . if state is false , the PerformanceController try to disconnect ApplicationVM if state is true, it releases the lock and applies a regulation time before the next control
      void removeVMNotification(java.lang.Boolean state)
      the removeVMNotification method receives a notification from the RequestDispatcher to indicate the result of Disconnecting an applicationVM.
      void updateRingVM(boolean exist, ApplicationVMPortsInformation appinfo)
      this method is used to add new ApplicationVM in the list of RingNetwork ApplicationVM . updateRingVM add the received from RequestDispatcher released ApplicationVM
